description: Ever thought of turning avocados into ice-cream? You won't regret this incredibly creamy and easy-to-make avocado, choc-chip and pistachio ice-cream.
name: Avocado Choc-Chip Ice-Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Fold cream and chocolate chips into avocado mixture. Transfer to a 1L capacity loaf pan, then scatter over pistachios. Cover and freeze for 4 hours or until firm. Serve.
Fold cream and chocolate chips into avocado mixture. Transfer to a 1L capacity loaf pan, then scatter over pistachios. Cover and freeze for 4 hours or until firm. Serve.
